title: Air Force Officer's Guide
features: Air Force officers of all ranks, from cadets to generals, both active duty and reserves, will find this revised edition essential reading for a successful career.
description: Col. Stephen E. Wright, USAF (Ret.), served in the United States Air Force for 30 years and is currently the Education Advisor and Deputy Commandant at the School of Advanced Air and Space Studies at Maxwell Air Force Base in Montgomery, Alabama. He is the author of An Aerospace Strategy for the Aerospace Nation (978-1288300471) and numerous articles on Air Force issues.
